## Description

Create a GSA Material for a GSA Section, Prop2d or Prop3d

_Note: This is a dropdown component and input/output may vary depending on the selected dropdown_

### Input parameters

|<img width="20"/> Icon |<img width="200"/> Type |<img width="200"/> Name |<img width="1000"/> Description |
| ----------- | ----------- | ----------- | ----------- |
|![TextParam](./images/TextParam.png) |`Text` |**Grade Name** |Search for a Grade name in the selected material and code |
